mapper.select: SELECT sale_plan_id as salePlanId, user_id as userId, plan_date as planDate, status FROM bison_amz_product_inventory.sale_plan
select ik.itme_key_id as itmeKeyId, itme_key as itmeKey from bison.itme_key ik, bison.user u where ik.business_unit_id = u.business_unit_id group by ik.itme_key_id

SELECT spi.country , spi.model_no as modelNo, spi.sale_plan_item_id as salePlanItemId
FROM bison_amz_product_inventory.sale_plan sp, bison_amz_product_inventory.sale_plan_item spi where sp.sale_plan_id = spi.sale_plan_id
SELECT count(1) FROM bison_amz_product_inventory.sale_plan_item spi, bison_amz_product_inventory.sale_plan sp where spi.sale_plan_id = sp.sale_plan_id and sp.sale_plan_id = #{salePlanId}

SELECT ik.item_key_id as itemKeyId, ik.item_key as itemKey, iv.item_val_id as itemValId, iv.item_val as itemVal, ik.type, ik.status, ik.last_day_val as lastDayVal
FROM bison_amz_product_inventory.sale_plan_item spi, bison_amz_product_inventory.item_key ik, bison_amz_product_inventory.item_val iv WHERE spi.sale_plan_item_id = iv.sale_plan_item_id AND iv.item_key_id = ik.item_key_id AND spi.sale_plan_item_id = #{salePlanItemId}
SELECT count(1) FROM bison_amz_product_inventory.sale_plan WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND plan_date like concat('',#{time},'%')

SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.user_name as userName FROM bison_amz_product_inventory.sale_plan sp, bison.user u where sp.user_id = u.user_id and u.business_unit_id = #{businessUnitId} and sp.status = #{status}
SELECT country_id from bison.country where country_name = #{countryName}
SELECT product_id from bison.product where product_model_number = #{productModelNumber}
